A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This one truly pushes and stretches the boundaries of what we've previously seen in Star Wars movies. You'll either love or hate that\, so the mixed fan reaction doesn't surprise me. 

I\, for one\, loved it\, even as someone who's old enough to have grown up with the original trilogy. Last Jedi paid its share of homage to those movies\, but it also cut its own path in many ways as well with the new characters and storylines. As it should. 

This is ultimately what the Star Wars movies should be about -- inventiveness. Fanboys quibbling over certain things not adhering to the letter of a Wookieepedia entry on this character or that are missing the point.
